channel.title: James C. Wang on 沈潔 - 資深新聞工作者
channel.description: Recent content in James C. Wang on 沈潔 - 資深新聞工作者

item.title: Calling a spade a spade
item.description: Calling a spade a spade James C. Wang Referring to Taiwan as “The Republic of Taiwan,” President George W. Bush of the United States caused an uproar in China and a ripple in Taiwan.
